name: Superstar Gymnastic Tattoo
description:
Hear Hear! Get your princess fashion tattoo today at the superstar gymnastic fab tattoo studio. This fashion salon meets all the needs of beautiful cheerleaders and gymnasts who want to get fab gymnastic tattoo for their cheerleader dance party. Play now this super fun cheerleader game to get your fashion tattoo studio experience.

OXO Games Studio brings a great girls tattoo game in the casual games, fun games and tattoo games category. Use real tattoo machine to draw beautiful tattoos from a wide variety and feel like a gymnast princess in the tattoo fashion salon. Play now and become an expert tattoo artist in the fab tattoo studio.

FEATURES:
- Draw beautiful tattoos
- Use real tattoo machine
- Become an expert tattoo artist
- Be sure to clean the skin before drawing awesome tattoos on your customers
- Beautiful HD Graphics
- Easy to play
- Free to play forever
- No In-App Purchases
- No Wi-Fi required
and much more…

JOIN US ON SOCIAL NETWORKS:

Join our Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/oxoapps
